tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had surgery to remove my uterus and an ovarian cyst, and I can't thank Dr. Tripti Raheja  enough for the outstanding care I received.She  *** ********** ************* *** took the time to explain everything to me, which really helped to calm my nerves. During the surgery, her  skills and professionalism were evident, and I felt I was in the best hands. 
After the operation, Dr. Tripti  continued to provide excellent care, checking in on my recovery and ensuring I was comfortable. Her kindness and dedication made a significant difference in my experience. I'm so grateful to her for making a difficult time much easier and for helping me heal so well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Support during my complicated pregnancy was exceptional. Always available to answer questions and provide comfort.
The care and treatment plan for my heavy periods significantly improved my quality of life. Feeling much more comfortable now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is a brilliant doctor. Always ready to answer your problems. I visited here for my pregnancy. With 
Her guidance and support i don't face any problems during my whole pregnancy. She is very calm and a very nice person. Overall she is a fabulous doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** ****** I was suffering from heavy menstruation problems and it was diagnosed as a PCOD problem by my previous doctor and I took treatment for more than 6 months regularly but symptoms get controlled by taking medication only if I didn't take the medicine then automatically it starts bleeding. Because of this I need to take the hormonal medicines for every 2-3 months interval. But luckily after a long wait of 3 year I meet Dr Tripti through practo and she solved my problem just within a month. At 1st visit she told me it's not a problem of PCOD because my symptoms is totally different from this condition so that she advised me some procedure with different cost which is very important for my problems and asked me to choose whichever is convenient for me. I choose one on my 2nd visit and procedure was done on next day(26/04/18). Since then I don't have any problems like before. It's really amazing and magical. I wish I could have meet her before. If anyone have same problem like me you should have visit her. She never felt hesitate even if I asked so many questions she always try to make me understand and clear my doubts.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited the doctor for treatment of heavy periods. She gave me medicine to stop periods immediately and told me to do an ultrasound. I again went after 20 days to show her ultrasound . she told that ultrasound has no significance as it should be done 1 day after periods have been stopped. Now why she had not told me this before?. Why I have wasted money on ultrasound and time  **** ** ** ** ** ****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
She is Very Sweet & Supportive by Nature. She Never Irritated when i ask my questions with her. Not Charged Extra, Answered All Queries Very Calmly. I was Very Nervous Before Meeting Her But When I talk With Her I talk Freely. I recommended her she's really Good. Currently My Treatment is running in her Clinic, Hopefully Mam We'll Succeed Soon.

Thank You
